availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William F. Parrent (Franklin County assessor and farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Elected assessor of the Franklin County Court in 1859. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 47. Find A Grave, "William F Parrent (1819-1878)," Memorial #64093666, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=PARR&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=161&GRid=64093666& (accessed April 25, 2017). L.F. Johnson, The History of Frankllin County, KY., (Frankfort, KY: Roberts Printing Co., 1912), 146. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Bridgeport Precinct, p. 37.
